snippet.title: These Shapes are the Same
snippet.description:
We’re on the cutting edge of mathematics.

Thanks to Dima Smirnov and Zivvy Epstein for letting us use their program to help visualize dissection. You can try it for yourself!

http://dmsm.github.io/scissors-congruence/

Further Reading:

http://press.princeton.edu/chapters/s9489.pdf

http://web.mit.edu/tabbott/www/papers/hinged.pdf

Hinged Dissections: Swinging and Twisting, by Greg N. Frederickson

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Images licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Types_of_Carbon_Nanotubes.png

Images licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Generic:

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:G3dock.jpg

Music:
"Bicycle" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
